title: Could eBPF Save Us From CrowdStrike-Style Disasters?
author: Steven J Vaughan-Nichols
description: In the aftermath of the CrowdStrike Windows security fiasco, security experts and developers alike are looking for a safer way to run low-level security programs. One possible solution is eBPF.
cntitle: eBPF 能否拯救我们免受 CrowdStrike 式灾难？
cndescription: 在 CrowdStrike Windows 安全事件之后，安全专家和开发人员都在寻找更安全的方式来运行低级安全程序。eBPF 可能是其中一个解决方案。
